text: Bojan Samardžija (born 5 December 1985) is a Bosnia and Herzegovina cross- country skier. He competed in the men's 15 kilometre classical event at the 2006 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina male cross-country skiers Category:Olympic cross-country skiers of Bosnia and Herzegovina Category:Cross-country skiers at the 2006 Winter Olympics Category:People from Sokolac
title: Bojan Samardžija
